        Parameters:
        gameVersion - The version of the launched minecraft
        gameDir - The game directory
        gameTitle - The title in dock of the minecraft window on mac
        username - Player's username
        accessToken - The access token obtained when authenticating
        uuid - The UUID obtained when authenticating
        jvmArgs - Arguments for jvm (ex: -Xms512M & -Xmx1024M)

    • Method Detail

      • launchMinecraft

        public java.lang.Process launchMinecraft()
                                  throws java.lang.InterruptedException,
                                         java.io.IOException
        Launch minecraft !
        Returns:
        The created minecraft process
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - If the process is interrupted and throw on
        java.io.IOException - If the process throw one because it failed to start

      • printProcessOutput

        public void printProcessOutput(java.lang.Process process)
                        throws java.io.IOException
        Calling this will create two thread that print the process output and writing to "minecraftlogs.txt" in the gameDir
        Parameters:
        process - The process to read output
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If it fails to read the output
